foodMenu.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
foodMenu.description: Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian meat sauce that is a staple in most families. My super simple Spaghetti Bolognese is the perfect dinner for any night of the week and will wow your family or guests.

foodMenu.name: Vegan Tacos
foodMenu.description: These versatile vegan tacos are packed with black beans, vegan taco meat, pico de gallo and avocado and topped with a tahini sauce. Filling, colorful and delicious!

foodMenu.name: Vegan Chili
foodMenu.description: This vegan chilli packs in plenty of vegetables and doesn’t fall short on the flavour front. Serve it with rice or in jacket potatoes for a filling supper.

foodMenu.name: Roasted aubergine & curry
foodMenu.description: Slightly sweet with added richness from the coconut milk, this simple vegan curry is a winner. It's also freezable if you need a quick midweek fix.
